price: 4. Mpe soki baboyi kondimela yo, kasi ebele ya batindami baboyamaki kondimela liboso nayo, mpe epai ya Allah makambo manso makozongisama.
arabic: وَإِن يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدۡ كُذِّبَتۡ رُسُلٞ مِّن قَبۡلِكَۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-in yukadhibūka faqad kudhibat rusulun min qablika wa-ilā al-lahi tur'jaʿu al-umūru
